Key Match Events: Ismaila Sarr scored a penalty to secure a 1-0 victory for Senegal
Post-Match Reflections: Burundian coach Nda Yiragije Etienne expressed hope for a more interesting game in their next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burundi won their first away match against Malawi national team at Bingu national stadium
Others: Senegal's coach, Aliou Cisse mentioned that his team missed a lot of clear chances during the match
